item.title: Footer contact form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name placeholder "Full Name"]
[email* your-email placeholder "Email Address"]
[text* your-phone placeholder "Phone Number"]
[textarea your-message placeholder "Message"]
[submit class:pull-right "Submit"]

* Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam.

[your-subject] [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Smarty (http://premiumbluethemes.com/WordPress/wp_smarty/dark) admin@gmail.com Reply-To: [your-email] [your-subject] Smarty Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Smarty (http://premiumbluethemes.com/WordPress/wp_smarty/dark) [your-email] Reply-To: admin@gmail.com Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Your entered code is incorrect. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.

item.title: Send Resume
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Send Your Resume

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat, vel illum dolore eu feugiat nulla facilisis at vero eros et accumsan et iusto odio dignissim qui blandit praesent luptatum zzril delenit augue duis dolore te feugait nulla facilisi.

Eodem modo typi, qui nunc nobis videntur parum clari, fiant sollemnes in futurum. Claritas est etiam processus dynamicus, qui sequitur mutationem consuetudium lectorum.

[text* your-name placeholder "Full Name"]
[email* your-email placeholder "Email"]
[text* your-phone placeholder "Phone Number"]
[file your-file]
[submit "Send Resume"]
New Resume [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Phone: [your-phone] File: [your-file] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Smarty (http://premiumbluethemes.com/WordPress/wp_smarty/dark) admin@gmail.com Reply-To: [your-email] [your-subject] Smarty Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Smarty (http://premiumbluethemes.com/WordPress/wp_smarty/dark) [your-email] Reply-To: admin@gmail.com Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Your entered code is incorrect. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.
